title: Application Deadlines | Graduate College | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents:

Graduate College     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Graduate College      Graduate College   Main Menu    Admissions           Degree Admissions    Application Deadlines         Funding & Awards           Graduate Funding Overview    Fellowships & Awards    Other Funding         Programs           Graduate College Courses    Graduate Program in Neuroscience         Diversity           Recruitment    Fellows Mentoring & Support    DFI Program    PIF Program    PBRC-PREP Program    SROP Undergraduate Program         Academics           Dates & Events    Registration Info    Thesis    Exams & Defense    Policies & Procedures    TA Enrichment    Graduation Info    Student Forms    Student Resources         About Us           Staff Directory    Faculty Listings    Newsletters    Contact Us          Eyebrow menu    Faculty & Staff Resources    Alumni    +Give    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Graduate College    Admissions    Application Deadlines        Application Deadlines       Deadlines   Your application, application fee, academic credentials and any additional materials required by your program must be received by the deadline stated.  Deadlines are subject to change – it is advisable to apply early. Deadlines may change without notice and some programs will close before the stated deadline due to the large volume of applications they may receive, or other factors. It is to your advantage to apply well before the deadline. Applications and materials received after the deadlines will not be considered. Note that international applicants often have earlier deadlines than domestic applicants.       2020 Deadlines  2019 Deadlines         Graduate Application Deadlines    Click below for graduate application deadlines .  This list includes all graduate degree-program and certificate deadlines.  This list includes the general “unassigned” nondegree application deadline.  It also includes deadlines for nondegree status within a specific program, if the deadline is earlier than the general nondegree deadlines listed below, or if there are term admission restrictions. Also see below for nondegree deadline information.  Not all programs admit every term – check the list on the link above to verify if a program has term admission restrictions.       Graduate Application Deadlines        Nondegree Application Deadlines        Spring 2020  Summer 2020  Fall 2020      Nondegree Deadlines  November 15, 2019  April 15, 2020  August 1, 2020          General Nondegree Application Deadlines   Check Graduate Application Deadlines below for programs where the nondegree deadline is earlier or has term restrictions. If specifically not listed than the general nondegree deadlines apply. (Note:  Some programs do not admit program-specific nondegree students, and the program name will not be listed on the Graduate Nondegree Application.  If there is a quesion, contact the program directly.)    Graduate Application Deadlines        Degree Application Deadlines     Graduate Application Deadlines Spring 2020, Summer 2020, and Fall 2020 Term Start Dates     Spring 2020  Summer 2020  Fall 2020      Classes Begin  January 13, 2020  May 18, 2020 - Session I*
June 15, 2020 - Session II*

This list includes all graduate degree-program and certificate deadlines.  This list includes the general “unassigned” nondegree application deadline.  It also includes deadlines for nondegree status within a specific program, if the deadline is earlier than the general nondegree deadlines listed below, or if there are term admission restrictions.
